thread.title: Rabobank Libor Trader Banned From Industry by U.K. Regulator
thread.title_full: Rabobank Libor Trader Banned From Industry by U.K. Regulator - Bloomberg Business

author: Suzi Ring
title: Rabobank Libor Trader Banned From Industry by U.K. Regulator
text:
The U.K. Financial Conduct Authority banned a former Rabobank Groep trader from working in the financial industry following a criminal conviction for fraud in the U.S.
Lee Stewart pleaded guilty to his role in a conspiracy to manipulate Rabobankâ€™s U.S. Dollar Libor submissions in March, the FCA said in a statement Thursday. The action follows the recent ban of Paul Robson, another trader at Rabobank, also in connection with interest-rate manipulation, the regulator said.
